Text: Have a moment?
*Sigh* Young people \n nowadays don't respect \n their elders...
What's wrong?
Thank you for lending an \n old man an ear. You've \n got a lovely... heart.
Heh, thanks!
Wait, what's with the \n pause after lovely?

Would it be too much 
 trouble to ask you to 
 take a few pictures for 
 an old man?
Pictures? Sure, that \n sounds easy enough. \n What do you want?
Beautiful women, \n lots of 'em.

I'd take the pictures 
 myself, but they give 
 this old man the stink 
 eye whenever I try.
That's it! \n The same eye you're \n giving me now!

*Sigh* Sorry I bothered. 
 I'll just go find a hole 
 and crawl in it to 
 wait for the end.
*Cough* *Cough*
Are you okay?
My time on this mortal \n coil is almost up... \n *Cough*

It's said that pictures 
 of beautiful women can 
 ward off evil spirits 
 and their maladies.

I was hoping to have 
 some so I could live 
 just a little- 
 *Cough* *Cough*
Take it easy there.
Don't you worry about \n me. I'll fade out of \n your way soon enough.
*Cough* *Cough*
I'll get your pictures, \n just hang in there!
Oh, wonderful! I knew \n you had a beautiful... \n heart.
That pause after \n beautiful really isn't \n necessary...

If you find a real 
 looker, get her to 
 strike a pose before 
 taking the picture.

I'd say about five would 
 go a long way towards 
 warding off those evil 
 spirits.
Old Man: \n What could you possibly want with me?
Take Pictures of \n Beautiful Women Posing
Time to find some beautiful women...
Pictures Taken
Great picture, thanks for your help!
Nice picture!
This should do nicely, thanks!
Perfect, just one more to go!
I think I got a little too close.
I think I was too far away.
My angle was a little off.
I need to make sure it's framed right.
I have to get a pose.
Pose and Take a Selfie
l : Equip Camera \n m : Gesture
Really? Great!
Must be busy...
'Scuse me, mind if I ask you a favor?
Great!
No? Too bad...
This person doesn't fit that old guy's description.
Shoot, I need one \n more picture...
But everyone's \n avoiding me.
Just one measly picture \n would be enough.
Hmm, maybe if \n I use the tripod...
There we go!
Not bad, if I do \n say so myself.

That covers the five 
 beautiful women the old 
 man needs to ward off 
 those evil spirits.
Hey, I brought your \n pictures!
Oh, what a happy day! \n Gimme gimme.
Oh, nice one...
Look at her...
She's amazing.
And her too! \n Oh, they're \n real beauts!
I feel the life flowing \n back into me!
Wait, what's with this \n fifth girl?
She's smoking hot, \n isn't she? Wait, \n is there a problem?
Oh, well, no... \n *Cough*
Hm?
Sure, I guess someone \n out there might think \n she's attractive.

Anyway, you've done this 
 old man good. Never let 
 go of that beautiful... 
 heart.
These pictures may have \n just saved my life! \n Thank you.
You're welcome, I hope \n you feel better soon!
It was kinda fun taking \n all those pictures, \n maybe I'll keep it up.
